copyData.subHeading: select one or more of the classes to learn more about its benefits
copyData.section1Summary: For existing data centers with limited expansion plans and low computing density
copyData.section1:
FOR FACILITIES THAT ARE:
Existing facilities with growth plans or expansion
Retrofit data centers, infrastructure refreshes
Greenfield or new data center builds
Requiring technology upgrades or refreshes
Utilizing a medium density per enclosure, 5-10 kW range
At increased security risks or data center intrusions
copyData.section2Summary: For existing facilities with expansion plans and efficiency upgrades through retrofit or new infrastructure builds
copyData.section2:
FOR FACILITIES THAT ARE:
Existing facilities with growth plans or expansion
Retrofit data centers, infrastructure refreshes
Greenfield or new data center builds
Requiring technology upgrades or refreshes
Utilizing a medium density per enclosure, 5-10 kW range
At increased security risks or data center intrusions
copyData.section3Summary: For Greenfield or retrofit data centers using state-of-the-art network and infrastructure designs
copyData.section3:
FOR FACILITIES THAT ARE:
Existing facilities with growth plans or expansion
Retrofit data centers, infrastructure refreshes
Greenfield or new data center builds
Requiring technology upgrades or refreshes
Utilizing a medium density per enclosure, 5-10 kW range
At increased security risks or data center intrusions
copyData.bottomSectionCopy: View products available within your selected class(es)

section.heading: RACKS
section.bullet: 19" EIA 310-D compliant with identified RMU spacing

section.heading: PDU
section.bullet: Basic 120 V or 208 V single-phase product

section.heading: COOLING
section.bullet: Hot and cold aisle data center layout

section.heading:
CABINETS
IP-Class 1+ requirements plus:
section.bullet: Width to fit Cat 6 cable and cable management

section.heading: PDU
section.bullet: 208 V, single phase, metered, monitored or switched

section.heading:
CABINETS
IP-Class 5+ requirements plus:
section.bullet: Width to fit Cat 6A cable and cable management
Cabinet level security system–locks and audit trail capture
Capacity to accommodate up to 2,500-lb. payload

section.heading:
UPS
IP-Class 5+ requirements plus:
section.bullet: Ultra efficiency ratings, min. 95% at 50% load
Configurable runtime, with alternative fuel supply capability

section.heading: PDU
section.bullet: Three-phase basic, IP metered, monitored and/or switched

section.heading:
COOLING
IP-Class 5+ requirements plus:
section.bullet: Variable speed, fans, pumps and chillers
Free cooling air and water side economizers
